summary.subject: Dean Search, School of Computing and Information Systems, Singapore Management University
summary.position: Dean of the School of Computing and Information Systems (SCIS)

description.context: SMU has begun a global search for its next Dean of SCIS, a school established in 2003 and ranked highly for its contributions to computing education and research.
description.mission: SMU aims to provide transformative education and foster a multi-disciplinary research environment.

achievements.source: QS Business Master's Rankings 2024: Business Analytics

description.challenges: The new Dean will lead SCIS, advance its innovative educational approaches, and enhance the school's international visibility.
qualifications: Leadership experience in a research-intensive environment
Strong scholarly profile and contributions in Computing and Information Systems
Vision development and inspiring leadership abilities

application_process.support: Perrett Laver will assist with the search process.
application_process.requirements: Application includes a cover letter, teaching and research interests, and a full CV.
